name: Passing Flame
description:
Summary:

You're in a world where your lights about to wither away and gust monster are out to
destroy you, see how long you can last.

Game play:

Collecting flames around the map will keep your flame going, the arrow will show you where to go.

Controls:

Use W,A,S,D or the arrow keys to move.


Update 0.0.1:

Fixed camera jitter.

Fixed sprite tearing on the floor.
